languages.text: На телах среди грубых увечий едва различимы тонкие порезы — работа искусного пыточника, а не разгулявшихся бойцов.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Этих знатных господ заставили искать что-то, а когда нашли убили

languages.text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.
languages.original_text: На телах среди грубых увечий едва различимы тонкие порезы — работа искусного пыточника, а не разгулявшихся бойцов.

traits.locale_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.
Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.
Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.
Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.
Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

languages.text: 无数被肢解的尸体上，布满了肉眼几乎无法辨认的细微伤口。这并不是愤怒的战士留下的伤口，而是熟练的拷问者留下来的。
languages.original_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

traits.locale_text: 无数被肢解的尸体上，布满了肉眼几乎无法辨认的细微伤口。这并不是愤怒的战士留下的伤口，而是熟练的拷问者留下来的。

languages.text: Entre las muchas mutilaciones de los cadáveres, apenas logras distinguir unos cortes finos. Esto es obra de un maestro torturador, no de un combatiente furioso.
languages.original_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

traits.locale_text: Entre las muchas mutilaciones de los cadáveres, apenas logras distinguir unos cortes finos. Esto es obra de un maestro torturador, no de un combatiente furioso.

languages.text: 遺体には無数に切り刻まれているものの、薄い切り傷はほとんど目に見えないレベルだ―これは怒り狂った兵士の仕業ではなく、腕の立つ仕事人の手によるものだ。
languages.original_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

traits.locale_text: 遺体には無数に切り刻まれているものの、薄い切り傷はほとんど目に見えないレベルだ―これは怒り狂った兵士の仕業ではなく、腕の立つ仕事人の手によるものだ。

languages.text: Unter den zahlreichen Verstümmelungen der Leichen sind auch kaum sichtbare dünne Schnitte – die Arbeit eines fähigen Folterers, nicht von erzürnten Kämpfern.
languages.original_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

traits.locale_text: Unter den zahlreichen Verstümmelungen der Leichen sind auch kaum sichtbare dünne Schnitte – die Arbeit eines fähigen Folterers, nicht von erzürnten Kämpfern.

languages.text: Parmi les nombreuses mutilations, de fines coupures sont à peine visibles. Il s'agit de l'œuvre d'un tortionnaire compétent, pas de combattants enragés.
languages.original_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

traits.locale_text: Parmi les nombreuses mutilations, de fines coupures sont à peine visibles. Il s'agit de l'œuvre d'un tortionnaire compétent, pas de combattants enragés.

languages.text: Cesetlerdeki sayısız yaranın arasındaki ince kesikler zar zor fark edilir hâldeler. Bu, hiddetli bir savaşçının değil, kabiliyetli bir işkencecinin işi.
languages.original_text: Among numerous mutilations of the bodies, thin cuts are barely distinguishable — this is the work of a skilled torturer, not enraged fighters.

traits.locale_text: Cesetlerdeki sayısız yaranın arasındaki ince kesikler zar zor fark edilir hâldeler. Bu, hiddetli bir savaşçının değil, kabiliyetli bir işkencecinin işi.
